page.title: 14Churches
page.content: The churches in our area are all in Wootton. Besides the parish church of{ St. Mary's in Church Road{(Church of {England)}there is also a{Methodist Chapel in Cause End Road, and a{ {Baptist}Chapel next to the Lower School in Bedford Road. There are also services held for{Roman Catholics}in the Memorial Hall in Bedford Road. The first Baptist Chapel in Wootton was started at Yew Tree Cottage in Cause End Road and the baptistery still exists under the floorboards of the hallway. The present chapel, although dated 1836 was remodelled later. The Methodist Chapel also dates from the late 19th century. All the churches play an important part in village life. Many village clubs and organisations are connected with one or the other of the churches.
